LWDocument - class com.ecs.utils.stellent.LWDocument.
The LWDocument provides a lightweight mechanism for working with documents in a Stellent Content Server.

LWFacade - class com.ecs.utils.stellent.LWFacade.
The class contains a number of Stellent functions which utilise the IdcServerBean package.
LWFacade() - Constructor for class com.ecs.utils.stellent.LWFacade
Constructor which creates a LWFacade with a connection to port 4444 on the localhost and the sysadmin user.
LWFacade(String) - Constructor for class com.ecs.utils.stellent.LWFacade
Constructor which creates a LWFacade with a connection to the default port on the localhost as the passed user user.
LWFacade(String, String) - Constructor for class com.ecs.utils.stellent.LWFacade
Constructor which takes the Stellent server name and the user name the services called on the connection will be validated against.
LWFacade(String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.ecs.utils.stellent.LWFacade
Constructor which takes the Stellent server name, user name and server port.
